sub_title: Treasurer, ALM, Capital & Liquidity Management, Balance Sheet Management, Digital Assets, Market Risks
summary:
I am a dynamic, results-oriented, seasoned finance professional with comprehensive experience in Treasury, proven track record of success in delivering growth, profitability, and transformation; focused on adding economic value to the business.
One of the recent achievements was to take treasury venture from what was effectively a start-up to an established, consistently profitable, transparent, and compliant with evolving regulations business. 

Key areas of expertise lie in ALM, liquidity management, market risks management, developing & executing funding strategies, and capital monitoring & optimisation. Strengths are in leading a high-performing team, stakeholder management (internal/external), driving adoption of innovative solutions, systems & models’ implementation, budgeting, reporting, and employment of ratios & limit controls.

I use extensive experience in banking and technology implementation to drive efficiency in operational processes. 
A major part of my success I attribute to the strong commercial acumen, solid interpersonal and relationship building skills, proven project management capability, analytical mindset, resourcefulness in problem solving and adaptability.
